attributes.action: give the families of innocent victims the right to appeal a not guilty verdict and have a re-trial
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like you to look into the fact that offenders can appeal a custodial setence when found guilty but the families of innocent victims cannot even when the person on trial was found not guilty by a jury for the offence has no alibi and there was substancial evidence in the case to say that that person was actually guilty of the crime and the family of the victim can do nothing about it cause the law prevents them from doing so, well we all think its about time that this was changed and the victims or families of victims should have the right to have a least one chance to appeal if the offenders can then why can't the rest of us!!!!
